verses.text_plain: And Solomon the son of David was strengthened in his kingdom, and the Lord his God was with him, and magnified him exceedingly.
verses.verse_html: 1And Solomon the son of David was strengthened in his kingdom, and the Lord his God was with him, and magnified him exceedingly.

verses.text_plain: Then Solomon spake unto all Israel, to the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and to the judges, and to every governor in all Israel, the chief of the fathers.
verses.verse_html: 2Then Solomon spake unto all Israel, to the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and to the judges, and to every governor in all Israel, the chief of the fathers.

verses.text_plain: So Solomon, and all the congregation with him, went to the high place that was at Gibeon; for there was the tabernacle of the congregation of God, which Moses the servant of the Lord had made in the wilderness.
verses.verse_html: 3So Solomon, and all the congregation with him, went to the high place that was at Gibeon; for there was the tabernacle of the congregation of God, which Moses the servant of the Lord had made in the wilderness.

verses.text_plain: But the ark of God had David brought up from Kirjath–jearim to the place which David had prepared for it: for he had pitched a tent for it at Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 4But the ark of God had David brought up from Kirjath–jearim to the place which David had prepared for it: for he had pitched a tent for it at Jerusalem.

tokens.text: for it: for he had pitched

verses.text_plain: Moreover the brasen altar, that Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, had made, he put before the tabernacle of the Lord: and Solomon and the congregation sought unto it.
verses.verse_html:
5Moreover the brasen altar, that Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, had made, he put before the tabernacle of the Lord: and Solomon and the congregation sought unto it. ▼
▼ he put: or, was there

footnotes.body_html: ▼ he put: or, was there

verses.text_plain: And Solomon went up thither to the brasen altar before the Lord, which was at the tabernacle of the congregation, and offered a thousand burnt offerings upon it.
verses.verse_html: 6And Solomon went up thither to the brasen altar before the Lord, which was at the tabernacle of the congregation, and offered a thousand burnt offerings upon it.

verses.text_plain: In that night did God appear unto Solomon, and said unto him, Ask what I shall give thee.
verses.verse_html: 7In that night did God appear unto Solomon, and said unto him, Ask what I shall give thee.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon said unto God, Thou hast shewed great mercy unto David my father, and hast made me to reign in his stead.
verses.verse_html: 8And Solomon said unto God, Thou hast shewed great mercy unto David my father, and hast made me to reign in his stead.

tokens.text: and hast made me to reign

verses.text_plain: Now, O Lord God, let thy promise unto David my father be established: for thou hast made me king over a people like the dust of the earth in multitude.
verses.verse_html:
9Now, O Lord God, let thy promise unto David my father be established: for thou hast made me king over a people like the dust of the earth in multitude. ▼
▼ like…: Heb. much as the dust of the earth

tokens.text: for thou hast made me king

footnotes.body_text: ▼ like…: Heb. much as the dust of the earth
footnotes.body_html: ▼ like…: Heb. much as the dust of the earth

verses.text_plain: Give me now wisdom and knowledge, that I may go out and come in before this people: for who can judge this thy people, that is so great?
verses.verse_html: 10Give me now wisdom and knowledge, that I may go out and come in before this people: for who can judge this thy people, that is so great?

verses.text_plain: And God said to Solomon, Because this was in thine heart, and thou hast not asked riches, wealth, or honour, nor the life of thine enemies, neither yet hast asked long life; but hast asked wisdom and knowledge for thyself, that thou mayest judge my people, over whom I have made thee king:
verses.verse_html: 11And God said to Solomon, Because this was in thine heart, and thou hast not asked riches, wealth, or honour, nor the life of thine enemies, neither yet hast asked long life; but hast asked wisdom and knowledge for thyself, that thou mayest judge my people, over whom I have made thee king:

tokens.text: Because this was in thine heart
for thyself, that thou mayest judge
over whom I have made thee king

verses.text_plain: Wisdom and knowledge is granted unto thee; and I will give thee riches, and wealth, and honour, such as none of the kings have had that have been before thee, neither shall there any after thee have the like.
verses.verse_html: 12Wisdom and knowledge is granted unto thee; and I will give thee riches, and wealth, and honour, such as none of the kings have had that have been before thee, neither shall there any after thee have the like.

tokens.text: unto thee; and I will give
such as none of the kings
thee, neither shall there any after

verses.text_plain: Then Solomon came from his journey to the high place that was at Gibeon to Jerusalem, from before the tabernacle of the congregation, and reigned over Israel.
verses.verse_html: 13Then Solomon came from his journey to the high place that was at Gibeon to Jerusalem, from before the tabernacle of the congregation, and reigned over Israel.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon gathered chariots and horsemen: and he had a thousand and four hundred chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen, which he placed in the chariot cities, and with the king at Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 14And Solomon gathered chariots and horsemen: and he had a thousand and four hundred chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen, which he placed in the chariot cities, and with the king at Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And the king made silver and gold at Jerusalem as plenteous as stones, and cedar trees made he as the sycomore trees that are in the vale for abundance.
verses.verse_html:
15And the king made silver and gold at Jerusalem as plenteous as stones, and cedar trees made he as the sycomore trees that are in the vale for abundance. ▼
▼ made: Heb. gave

verses.text_plain: And Solomon had horses brought out of Egypt, and linen yarn: the king’s merchants received the linen yarn at a price.
verses.verse_html:
16And Solomon had horses brought out of Egypt, and linen yarn: the king’s merchants received the linen yarn at a price. ▼
▼ Solomon…: Heb. the going forth of the horses which was Solomon’s

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Solomon…: Heb. the going forth of the horses which was Solomon’s
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Solomon…: Heb. the going forth of the horses which was Solomon’s

verses.text_plain: And they fetched up, and brought forth out of Egypt a chariot for six hundred shekels of silver, and an horse for an hundred and fifty: and so brought they out horses for all the kings of the Hittites, and for the kings of Syria, by their means.
verses.verse_html:
17And they fetched up, and brought forth out of Egypt a chariot for six hundred shekels of silver, and an horse for an hundred and fifty: and so brought they out horses for all the kings of the Hittites, and for the kings of Syria, by their means. ▼
▼ means: Heb. hand
